name: 1 LIFE (SuperJosh6)
description:
Controls: Arrow keys to move, Z to jump

1 LIFE is a platformer game which combines gameplay aspects of the famous Kaizo genre and Foddian Games. Run, jump, and avoid obstacles  to reach the end of the level, but die just once and get sent back to the BEGINNING of the game.

coding took around half the time of the jam duration so i only got around to 2 levels (level "3" is a little tech demo level i made around the beginning, shown in preview video).

(also if you happen to get stuck after triple jumping, press F to get fixed)

Just found a crash with falling platforms  (didint crash before removing GMLive) so sorry about that

Html version seems alittle bugged, so if possible play executable version, I don't have any more time to bug fix sorry.  (also video is an early build)
